bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Helen Wheeler to Philip Showalter Hench, October 26, 1940

div1.p: Wheeler informs Hench he may copy any of the library's yellow fever material.

div1.head: Letter from Helen Wheeler to Philip Showalter Hench, October 26, 1940
div1.opener:
THE JOHNS HOPKINS UNIVERSITY
WELCH MEDICAL LIBRARY
1900 EAST MONUMENT STREET
BALTIMORE, MD.
October 26, 1940.
3/6/41 - send Mile Stone
come
Dr. P. S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
We shall be glad to have you copy
or photostat any of the yellow fever material
that you wish to keep. There is no particular
hurry about returning it, so if you prefer
you might wait until you have finished with
it and return it all at once.

We should like very much to have
a list of the material you have found, and
appreciate your offer.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours Helen Wheeler.
For the Librarian HW
